languages.text: {n}Мужчина равнодушно пожимает плечами. В его голосе сквозит сочувствие.{/n} "Это не важно. Вы — призраки".
{n}The man shrugs indifferently. His voice is tinged with sympathy:{/n} "It does not matter. You are ghosts."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина равнодушно пожимает плечами. В его голосе сквозит сочувствие.{/n} "Это не важно. Вы — призраки".

languages.text: {n}男は興味なさそうに肩をすくめる。その声には同情の響きがある。{/n}「それは問題ではない。あなたは亡霊だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The man shrugs indifferently. His voice is tinged with sympathy:{/n} "It does not matter. You are ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は興味なさそうに肩をすくめる。その声には同情の響きがある。{/n}「それは問題ではない。あなたは亡霊だ」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}男人冷漠地耸了耸肩，他的声音里略带着同情。{/n}“无关紧要。你们只是鬼魂罢了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man shrugs indifferently. His voice is tinged with sympathy:{/n} "It does not matter. You are ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}男人冷漠地耸了耸肩，他的声音里略带着同情。{/n}“无关紧要。你们只是鬼魂罢了。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Il hausse les épaules avec indifférence, sa voix cette fois teintée d'une forme de compassion.{/n} « Peu importe. Vous n'êtes rien de plus que des fantômes. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man shrugs indifferently. His voice is tinged with sympathy:{/n} "It does not matter. You are ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il hausse les épaules avec indifférence, sa voix cette fois teintée d'une forme de compassion.{/n} « Peu importe. Vous n'êtes rien de plus que des fantômes. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}El hombre, mostrándose indiferente, se encoge de hombros. Su voz denota cierta compasión.{/n} «No importa. Sois fantasmas».
languages.original_text: {n}The man shrugs indifferently. His voice is tinged with sympathy:{/n} "It does not matter. You are ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre, mostrándose indiferente, se encoge de hombros. Su voz denota cierta compasión.{/n} «No importa. Sois fantasmas».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Der Mann zuckt gleichgültig mit den Achseln. Seine Stimme ist durchzogen von Mitleid.{/n} "Es ist gleichgültig. Ihr seid Geister."
languages.original_text: {n}The man shrugs indifferently. His voice is tinged with sympathy:{/n} "It does not matter. You are ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann zuckt gleichgültig mit den Achseln. Seine Stimme ist durchzogen von Mitleid.{/n} "Es ist gleichgültig. Ihr seid Geister."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Adam, umursamazca omuz silkiyor. Sesinde acıdığı tınısını duyuyorsun.{/n} "Önemi yok. Sizler hayaletsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}The man shrugs indifferently. His voice is tinged with sympathy:{/n} "It does not matter. You are ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam umursamazca omuz silkiyor. Sesinde acıma izleri var:{/n} "Önemi yok. Sizler hayaletsiniz."
traits.speaker: Chief
